backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining competition, user, result types and maps, admin allowlist logic, and comparison helpers for events and results.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module providing a no-op upgrade from the old actor state to a new empty state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing the updated AdminGuard requirement and referencing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and API utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS root theme variables and dark mode overrides for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app and main script entrypoint.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Utility for converting backend error messages into user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key definitions for competitions, profiles, results, and admin checks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routing, theme, query client, and profile-setup gating.
Admin-only access wrapper using backend admin check with updated messaging for multiple allowlisted admins.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling dual-state authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard that blocks unauthenticated users and shows a login prompt.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Renders a clickable card showing competition name, status, dates, participant limit, and basic event info, navigating to the competition page on click.
Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and special handling for the solve flow view.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Displays a leaderboard table computing Ao5 scores, showing ranks, competitor names, and formatted solve times with penalties.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Shows the user's profile info with an inline editor allowing display name updates via profile mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for first‑time users to enter email and display name, submitting via profile creation and email‑setting hooks.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Runs the 15‑second inspection countdown with +2 and DNF thresholds, showing scramble and signaling completion with penalty.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Presents a completion screen after all solves with buttons to view the leaderboard or return to the competition page.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: A timer component that tracks solve duration, displays running state, and reports the final time via onComplete.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Exports test-mode Razorpay configuration including key, currency, branding, and theme.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload warning when enabled to prevent accidental page exit.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller’s user profile using the actor, handling load state and query control.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
Blocks browser navigation when enabled and prompts the user before allowing back navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines various React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, competitions, results, and mutations via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with CSS variables for themes and color palettes including dark mode.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Calculates average-of-five solve times handling DNFs and exports a leaderboard entry type.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay script and opens the checkout widget with configured options and callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond solve times into seconds.milliseconds or returns DNF for invalid values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Admin form for creating competitions, selecting events, configuring scrambles, and submitting to backend.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Shows competition details, manages event selection, payment, and starting a competition session.
Fetches and displays competitions grouped by status with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Loads competition leaderboard data, filters completed results, and displays them with user profiles.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Controls the solve workflow including inspection, timing, submitting attempts, and progressing through attempts.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event labels, the full event list, and the default event.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color system, extended animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current architecture, features, issues, and admin requirements for a full‑stack online speedcubing platform using Next.js, PostgreSQL, Prisma, and NextAuth.
